ayahs.textUthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ وَلَا تَعْجَلْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يُقْضَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِى عِلْمًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَتَعَـٰلَى [So high (above all)] ٱللَّهُ [(is) Allah] ٱلْمَلِكُ [the King] ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ [the True] وَلَا [And (do) not] تَعْجَلْ [hasten] بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ [with the Quran] مِن [before] قَبْلِ [before] أَن [[that]] يُقْضَىٰٓ [is completed] إِلَيْكَ [to you] وَحْيُهُۥ ۖ [its revelation] وَقُل [and say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] زِدْنِى [Increase me] عِلْمًۭا [(in) knowledge]
ayahs.transliteration: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu wala taAAjal bilqur-animin qabli an yuqda ilayka wahyuhu waqul rabbizidnee AAilma

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَهِدْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبْلُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمْ نَجِدْ لَهُۥ عَزْمًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] عَهِدْنَآ [We made a covenant] إِلَىٰٓ [with] ءَادَمَ [Adam] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] فَنَسِىَ [but he forgot] وَلَمْ [and not] نَجِدْ [We found] لَهُۥ [in him] عَزْمًۭا [determination]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad AAahidna ila adamamin qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu AAazma

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِـَٔادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِذْ [And when] قُلْنَا [We said] لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ [to the Angels] ٱسْجُدُوا۟ [Prostrate] لِـَٔادَمَ [to Adam] فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ [then they prostrated] إِلَّآ [except] إِبْلِيسَ [Iblis] أَبَىٰ [he refused]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-ith qulna lilmala-ikatiosjudoo li-adama fasajadoo illa ibleesa aba

ayahs.textUthmani: فَقُلْنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا عَدُوٌّ لَّكَ وَلِزَوْجِكَ فَلَا يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ فَتَشْقَىٰٓ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَقُلْنَا [Then We said] يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ [O Adam] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذَا [this] عَدُوٌّۭ [(is) an enemy] لَّكَ [to you] وَلِزَوْجِكَ [and to your wife] فَلَا [So not] يُخْرِجَنَّكُمَا [(let) him drive you both] مِنَ [from] ٱلْجَنَّةِ [Paradise] فَتَشْقَىٰٓ [so (that) you would suffer]
ayahs.transliteration: Faqulna ya adamu innahatha AAaduwwun laka walizawjika falayukhrijannakuma mina aljannati fatashqa

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعْرَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] لَكَ [for you] أَلَّا [that not] تَجُوعَ [you will be hungry] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَا [and not] تَعْرَىٰ [you will be unclothed]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna laka alla tajooAAa feehawala taAAra

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظْمَؤُا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضْحَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَنَّكَ [And that you] لَا [not] تَظْمَؤُا۟ [will suffer from thirst] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَا [and not] تَضْحَىٰ [exposed to the sun's heat]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَوَسْوَسَ [Then whispered] إِلَيْهِ [to him] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ [Shaitaan] قَالَ [he said] يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ [O Adam] هَلْ [Shall] أَدُلُّكَ [I direct you] عَلَىٰ [to] شَجَرَةِ [(the) tree] ٱلْخُلْدِ [(of) the Eternity] وَمُلْكٍۢ [and a kingdom] لَّا [not] يَبْلَىٰ [(that will) deteriorate]
ayahs.transliteration: Fawaswasa ilayhi ashshaytanuqala ya adamu hal adulluka AAalashajarati alkhuldi wamulkin la yabla

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَكَلَا مِنْهَا فَبَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَكَلَا [Then they both ate] مِنْهَا [from it] فَبَدَتْ [so became apparent] لَهُمَا [to them] سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا [their shame] وَطَفِقَا [and they began] يَخْصِفَانِ [(to) fasten] عَلَيْهِمَا [on themselves] مِن [from] وَرَقِ [(the) leaves] ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ [(of) Paradise] وَعَصَىٰٓ [And Adam disobeyed] ءَادَمُ [And Adam disobeyed] رَبَّهُۥ [his Lord] فَغَوَىٰ [and erred]
ayahs.transliteration: Faakala minha fabadat lahumasaw-atuhuma watafiqa yakhsifaniAAalayhima min waraqi aljannati waAAasa adamurabbahu faghawa

ayahs.textUthmani: ثُمَّ ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ وَهَدَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] ٱجْتَبَـٰهُ [chose him] رَبُّهُۥ [his Lord] فَتَابَ [and turned] عَلَيْهِ [to him] وَهَدَىٰ [and guided (him)]

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ ٱهْبِطَا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًۢا ۖ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّى هُدًى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشْقَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] ٱهْبِطَا [Go down] مِنْهَا [from it] جَمِيعًۢا ۖ [all] بَعْضُكُمْ [some of you] لِبَعْضٍ [to others] عَدُوٌّۭ ۖ [(as) enemy] فَإِمَّا [Then if] يَأْتِيَنَّكُم [comes to you] مِّنِّى [from Me] هُدًۭى [guidance] فَمَنِ [then whoever] ٱتَّبَعَ [follows] هُدَاىَ [My guidance] فَلَا [then not] يَضِلُّ [he will go astray] وَلَا [and not] يَشْقَىٰ [suffer]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala ihbita minhajameeAAan baAAdukum libaAAdin AAaduwwun fa-immaya/tiyannakum minnee hudan famani ittabaAAa hudaya falayadillu wala yashqa

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَنْ أَعْرَضَ عَن ذِكْرِى فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةً ضَنكًا وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَعْمَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَنْ [And whoever] أَعْرَضَ [turns away] عَن [from] ذِكْرِى [My remembrance] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] لَهُۥ [for him] مَعِيشَةًۭ [(is) a life] ضَنكًۭا [straitened] وَنَحْشُرُهُۥ [and We will gather him] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ [(of) the Resurrection] أَعْمَىٰ [blind]
ayahs.transliteration: Waman aAArada AAan thikreefa-inna lahu maAAeeshatan danka wanahshuruhuyawma alqiyamati aAAma

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He will say] رَبِّ [My Lord] لِمَ [Why] حَشَرْتَنِىٓ [You raised me] أَعْمَىٰ [blind] وَقَدْ [while [verily]] كُنتُ [I had] بَصِيرًۭا [sight]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala rabbi lima hashartaneeaAAma waqad kuntu baseera
